::Spears::

She looked at Ratchet and Bluestreak, "How can we help?"
She reached down and took Strikers hand and gave it a light squeeze.  
She thought, all things come to those who wait.  But she wondered how 
long that wait would be.  

"Please tell us everyhing you can about this Calibos.  What is he? 
Where did he come from? Whom did he kill precisially? What does he 
look like? And how can we help you with this?"


> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:

plotting
